entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
